html.p: This dashboard and these panels illustrate extracting passed wireless 802.1X user authentication information from a specific location.

chart.title: Passed Authentications Wired - $location$
chart.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-passed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | chart count by AuthenticationMethod | rename AuthenticationMethod AS "Authentication Method"

table.title: Passed Total Authentications
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-passed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | stats count by AuthenticationMethod | rename AuthenticationMethod AS "Authentication Method"

table.title: 802.1X Authentications
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-passed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | stats count by AuthenticationMethod EapTunnel EapAuthentication UserName Address EndPointMACAddress EndPointMatchedProfile HostIdentityGroup | `format_field_names`

table.title: EAP-TLS
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-passed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" EapAuthentication="EAP-TLS" | stats count by AuthenticationMethod EapAuthentication UserName EndPointMACAddress Address EndPointMatchedProfile | `format_field_names`

table.title: Authentication Details
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-passed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | stats count by AuthenticationMethod EapTunnel EapAuthentication NetworkDeviceGroups NetworkDeviceName NAS_Identifier NAS_Port NAS_IP_Address Called_Station_ID Airespace_Wlan_Id EndPointMatchedProfile UserName | `format_field_names`

table.title: MAB
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-passed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" AuthenticationMethod="Lookup" | stats count by AuthenticationMethod | rename AuthenticationMethod AS "Authentication Method"
